knimeNode.name: Plate Row Converter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts plate row characters to numbers and vice versa.

intro.p:
Converts plate row characters to numbers and vice versa. The node automatically detects the required direction of conversion based on the type of the selected source columns.
Row characters (e.g. B or C) will be replaced with their corresponding row number (e.g. 2 or 3) or vice versa.

fullDescription.option: Select the columns that contain plate row identifier.

ports.outPort: Data table with converted row columns
